environment.description: If provided, will overlay the starter environment for every seed in this packet

id.description: A local seed ID must just be letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores

description.description: An optional description for what a seed does, sometimes shown to users

comment.description: A string that is ignored, useful for internal comments

private.description: If marked as private, then seeds from a different packet won't be able to access this seed.

anyOf.description: A seed packet absolute location is a local path
A https:// or http:// absolute location
A seed packet location must be a relative path, starting with . or ..
